title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-7.2 - Persons Required to Pay
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-7.2 - Persons Required to Pay

State Regulations

Regulatory fees must be paid by each person not
specifically exempted herein who: (a) owns or constructs a dock, mooring or wharf within the Park, exclusive of Trout

Lake; and
(b) uses on the waters of

Lake George any mechanically propelled boat or vessel with a motor of ten
horsepower or more. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-7.2

Amended

New

York State Register March 8, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 10, eff. 3/8/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
